description: Ms. codex. Title from text 1. Physical description: 24 lines per page; written in neat naskh in black on wove paper. Text 1 has rubrication; in text 2 spaces left for rubrication are not filled in. Catchwords. A few leaves are detached; first few and last few leaves are brittle and ragged. Occasional staining. Origin: First half of 19th century.
abstract: Contains two commentaries on Ibn al-Shahīd al-Thānī's Maʻālim al-dīn wa-malādhdh al-mujtahidīn, a treatise on uṣūl al-fiqh.
contents: 1. fol. 2b-232b: al-Mujallad al-awwal min Hidāyat al-mustarshidīn ilá uṣūl Maʻālim al-dīn.
extent: 246 leaves : paper ; 246 x 184 (172 x 90-103) mm bound to 246 x 187 mm

title.@value: المجلد الاول من هداية المسترشدين الى اصول معالم الدين.
al-Mujallad al-awwal min Hidāyat al-mustarshidīn ilá uṣūl Maʻālim al-dīn ... [etc.].
